unnormalised: Regarding the recent Class 10 board exams, students can access their results on 15/05/2024 via the CBSE website using their roll no. and school code. The re-evaluation window will open on 20/05/2024 as per circular no. CBSE/ACAD/2024/05.
normalised: Regarding the recent Class ten board exams, students can access their results on fifteenth May two thousand and twenty four via the C-B-S-E website using their roll number and school code. The re-evaluation window will open on twentieth May two thousand and twenty four as per circular number C-B-S-E slash A-C-A-D slash two thousand and twenty four slash zero five.
